bike.description: High performance carbon fiber composite with mid modulus fibers, FEA optimized, NearNet molded, Dyad Plus T700/FRP lay-up, formed down tube and top tube for comfortable portage with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" tapered head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO carbon BB shell, internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, twin seat stays with post mount disc mounts and brake strut on non-driveside for vibration-free braking, asymmetrical chainstays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis Cross, full carbon composite, NearNet molded, FEA optimized layup, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces
Alex XC23 eyeleted disc specific rim, 32H, Formula alloy disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Cross XG Pro, 700 x 32c, folding
SRAM Apex rear and Apex braze-on front
FSA Gossamer EVO cross double with Press Fit 30, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
Ritchey Road, 31.6 x 300mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
Avid BB-7 mechanical disc brake with 160mm front/140mm rear G2 CleanSweep rotors and SRAM Apex brake levers
